title: Frames stuck at 60, how do i increase it?
body: I mean i know that turning off vsync increases it, but it causes horrible screen tearing, is there anyway to fix this issue?

replies.body: Hearing that you are screen tearing is a concerning issue, and hopefully it's not a result of a hardware issue.  FPS issues generally can be due to outdated drivers or other settings, so we can troubleshoot that as a first step.  Go over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune up your PC, but keep in mind that it can't exceed what your hardware allows.  Hopefully, that will help your game run smoothly.

Ive tried to do almost everything on the issue list, but it isnt working,  I still can get 400 frames, but in exchange, my character just skips around the map, but when i enable vsync, it becomes normal but im capped at 60 frames.  my internet is not the issue either, since i usually play with 30~ pings with good upload / download speed

Thanks for the update!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can take a look.  I recommend attaching a set of logs for context which you can obtain through our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  We'll respond to your ticket asap!
